data.text: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔn akwan yɛ pɛ
Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔkora nʼahyɛdeɛ,
Wɔnnyɛ mfomsoɔ biara;
Woayɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ pa ato hɔ
Ao sɛ mʼakwan bɛyɛ tee
Sɛ mehwɛ wʼahyɛdeɛ no a
Mede akoma a emu teɛ bɛkamfo wo
Mɛdi wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm so;
Aberanteɛ bɛyɛ dɛn na nʼakwan ho ate?
Mede mʼakoma nyinaa hwehwɛ wo;
Mede wʼasɛm asie mʼakoma mu
Ao Awurade, nkamfo wɔ wo;
Mede mʼano ka mmara
Mʼani gye sɛ medi wʼahyɛdeɛ so
Medwendwene wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho
Mʼani gye wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm ho;
Yɛ wo ɔsomfoɔ yie;
Bue mʼani na menhunu anwanwadeɛ a
Meyɛ ɔnanani wɔ asase so;
Me kra tɔ baha ɛberɛ biara
Woka ahantanfoɔ anim, wɔn a wɔadome wɔn,
Yi kasatia ne animtiabuo firi me mu,
Ɛwom sɛ sodifoɔ hyia di me ho nsekuro,
Wʼahyɛdeɛ yɛ mʼanigyedeɛ
Woabrɛ me ase ma meda mfuturo mu.
Mesesee mʼakwan na wogyee me so;
Ma mente deɛ ɛwɔ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu ase;
Awerɛhoɔ ama me ɔkra atɔ baha;
Yi me firi nnaadaa akwan so;
Mafa nokorɛ kwan no so;
Ao Awurade, mekura wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu denden
Metu mmirika wɔ wo mmaransɛm kwan no so,
Kyerɛkyerɛ me, Ao Awurade, na menni wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm so,
Ma me nteaseɛ, na mɛdi wo mmara so,
Kyerɛ me wo mmaransɛm kwan no
Dane mʼakoma kɔ wʼahyɛdeɛ ho
Yi mʼani firi nneɛma hunu so;
Di ɛbɔ a woahyɛ wo ɔsomfoɔ no so,
Yi animguaseɛ a ɛbɔ me hu no firi hɔ,
Mʼani agyina wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no!
Ao Awurade, ma wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no mmra me so,
Afei, mɛbua deɛ ɔyi me ahi no,
Nyi nokwasɛm no mfiri mʼanom,
Mɛdi wo mmara so ɛberɛ biara
Mede ahofadie bɛnante
Mɛka wʼahyɛdeɛ ho asɛm wɔ ahemfo anim
ɛfiri sɛ mʼani gye wo mmaransɛm ho
Mede anidie ma wo mmaransɛm a medɔ no,
Kae asɛm a woaka akyerɛ wo ɔsomfoɔ,
Mʼawerɛkyekyerɛ wɔ mʼamanehunu mu ne sɛ:
Ahantanfoɔ bu me animtia bebree,
Ao Awurade mekae wo tete mmara no,
Abufuo hyɛ me ma, ɛsiane amumuyɛfoɔ
Wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm yɛ me dwom tiban
Ao Awurade, anadwo mekae wo din,
Yei ne adeɛ a meyɛ da biara,
Ao Awurade, wone me kyɛfa;
Mede mʼakoma nyinaa ahwehwɛ wo;
Madwene mʼakwan ho
Mɛyɛ ntɛm, merentwentwɛn
Ɛwom sɛ amumuyɛfoɔ de ahoma kyekyere me
Ɔdasuom, mesɔre de wʼaseda ma wo
Meyɛ wɔn a wɔsuro woɔ nyinaa adamfo,
Ao Awurade, wʼadɔeɛ ahyɛ asase so ma;
Wo ne wo ɔsomfoɔ nni no yie
Kyerɛkyerɛ me nimdeɛ ne atemmuo pa,
Ansa na merebɛhunu amane no, mefomm ɛkwan,
Woyɛ, na deɛ woyɛ nso yɛ;
Ahantanfoɔ de atorɔ afɔre me ho,
Wɔn akoma yɛ den na wɔnni tema,
Ɛyɛ sɛ mehunuu amane
Mmara a ɛfiri wʼanomu no som bo ma me
Wo nsa na ɛbɔɔ me na ɛnwonoo me;
Sɛ wɔn a wɔsuro wo no hunu me a, ma wɔn ani nnye,
Ao Awurade, menim sɛ wo mmara tene,
Ma wʼadɔeɛ a ɛnsa da nkyekyere me werɛ
Ma wʼayamhyehyeɛ mmra me so, na mennya nkwa,
Ma ahantanfoɔ ani nwu wɔ bɔne a wɔyɛɛ me,
Ma wɔn a wɔsuro wo no mmra me nkyɛn,
Ma mʼakoma nnya bembuo wɔ wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm ho,
Wo nkwagyeɛ ho anigyina ama me ɔkra atɔ baha,
Mahwɛ wo bɔhyɛ anim ama mʼani abu;
Ɛwom sɛ mete sɛ nsã kotokuo a ɛsɛn wisie ano deɛ,
Wo ɔsomfoɔ ntwɛn nkɔsi da bɛn?
Ahantanfoɔ atu amena de asum me afidie,
Wo mmaransɛm nyinaa mu wɔ ahotosoɔ;
Ɛkaa kakra bi na wɔyi me firi asase so,
Kyɛe me nkwa so sɛdeɛ wʼadɔeɛ teɛ,
Ao Awurade, wʼasɛm no tim hɔ daa;
Wo nokorɛdie kɔ so wɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu;
Wo mmara wɔ hɔ bɛsi ɛnnɛ,
Sɛ mʼani anka wo mmara no ho a,
Me werɛ remfiri wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no,
Gye me nkwa, na meyɛ wo dea;
Amumuyɛfoɔ retwɛn sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me,
Mahunu sɛ pɛyɛ nyinaa wɔ deɛ ɛkɔpem;
Ao medɔ wo mmara no!
Wo mmaransɛm ma me hunu nyansa sene mʼatamfoɔ,
Mewɔ nhunumu sene mʼakyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyinaa,
Mewɔ nteaseɛ sene mpanimfoɔ,
Memfaa me nan nsii ɛkwan bɔne biara so
Memmane memfirii wo mmara ho,
Wo nsɛm yɛ me dɛ,
Menya nteaseɛ firi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu;
Wʼasɛm yɛ me nan ase kanea
Maka ntam ahyɛ mu kena sɛ
Mahunu amane bebree;
Ao Awurade, ma wʼani nsɔ mʼanom nkamfo a ɛfiri me pɛ mu,
Ɛwom sɛ daa metoto me nkwa ase,
Amumuyɛfoɔ asum me afidie
Wʼahyɛdeɛ yɛ mʼagyapadeɛ afebɔɔ;
Mʼakoma ayɛ krado sɛ ɛbɛhwɛ wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm so
Mekyiri nnipa a wɔn adwene yɛ wɔn ntanta,
Wone me dwanekɔbea ne me kyɛm;
Momfiri me so nkɔ, mo nnebɔneyɛfoɔ,
Wowa me sɛdeɛ wo bɔhyɛ no teɛ, na mɛtena nkwa mu;
Sɔ me mu, na menya nkwagyeɛ;
Wopo wɔn a wɔfom wo ɔhyɛ nsɛm nyinaa,
Woyi amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa si nkyɛn sɛ dadeben;
Wo ho suro ma me ho popo;
Mayɛ deɛ ɛtene na ɛyɛ pɛ.
Hwɛ ma wo ɔsomfoɔ nni yie;
Mahwɛ wo nkwagyeɛ anim ama mʼani abu,
Wo ne wo ɔsomfoɔ nni no sɛdeɛ wʼadɔeɛ teɛ
Meyɛ wo ɔsomfoɔ; ma me nhunumu
Ao Awurade, ɛberɛ aso sɛ woyɛ biribi;
Esiane sɛ medɔ wo mmaransɛm
na medwene sɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ nyinaa yɛ enti
Wʼahyɛdeɛ yɛ nwanwa;
Wo nsɛm ase teɛ ma hann;
Mebue mʼanom na megu ahome,
Dane wʼani hwɛ me na hunu me mmɔbɔ
Tutu mʼanammɔn sɛdeɛ wʼasɛm no teɛ.
Gye me firi nnipa nhyɛsoɔ mu,
Ma wʼanim nhyerɛn wo ɔsomfoɔ so
Nisuo adware me sɛ asutene
Ɔteneneeni ne wo, Ao Awurade,
Ahyɛdeɛ a woayɛ no tene;
Abufuo ahyɛ me ma,
Wɔasɔ wo bɔhyɛ ahodoɔ no ahwɛ pa ara,
Ɛwom sɛ mennka hwee na memfra deɛ,
Wo tenenee wɔ hɔ daa
Ɔhaw ne ahohiahia aduru me,
Wʼahyɛdeɛ yɛ nokorɛ daa;
Ao Awurade, mede mʼakoma nyinaa mefrɛ wo, gye me so,
Mesu mefrɛ wo, gye me nkwa
Mesɔre anɔpahema, na mesu pɛ mmoa;
Mʼani gu so anadwo nyinaa,
Tie me nne sɛdeɛ wʼadɔeɛ no teɛ;
Wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ atirimuɔdensɛm no abɛn,
Ao Awurade, wo deɛ, wobɛn me,
Mmerɛ bi a atwam no, mesuaa wʼahyɛdeɛ
Hwɛ mʼamanehunu na gye me nkwa
Di mʼasɛm ma me na gye me.
Nkwagyeɛ ne atirimuɔdenfoɔ ntam kwan ware,
Ao Awurade, wʼayamhyehyeɛ yɛ kɛseɛ;
Atamfoɔ a wɔteetee me dɔɔso,
Mehwɛ wɔn a wɔnni gyidie no a, wɔn ho yɛ me nwunu,
Hwɛ sɛdeɛ mʼani gye wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho;
Wo nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokorɛ;
Sodifoɔ taataa me kwa,
Mʼani gye wo bɔhyɛ ho
Mekyiri nkontompo
Mekamfo wo mprɛnson da biara
Wɔn a wɔdɔ wo mmara no wɔ asomdwoeɛ mmoroso,
Ao Awurade, metwɛn wo nkwagyeɛ,
Medi wʼahyɛdeɛ so
Medi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ne wʼahyɛdeɛ so,
Ao Awurade, ma me sufrɛ nnuru wʼanim;
Ma me nkotosrɛ nnuru wʼanim;
Ma nkamfo nhyɛ mʼanom ma;
Ma me tɛkrɛma nto wʼasɛm ho dwom,
Yɛ ahoboa bɛboa me,
Ao Awurade, mʼani agyina wo nkwagyeɛ,
Ma me ntena nkwa mu na matumi akamfo wo,
Mafom ɛkwan sɛ odwan a wayera.
